name: The Enterprise Forum Ltd
goal: The Enterprise Forum is an independent, not for profit Forum which helps facilitate discussions between the UKâ€™s Business Community and UK and EU policy makers through a programme of events. The Enterprise Forum does not take a position on policy and does not donate or receive donations from any political party.
